00056 template <class EOT>
00057 class eoSelectTransform : public eoBreed<EOT>
00058 {
00059     public:
00060         eoSelectTransform(eoSelect<EOT>& _select, eoTransform<EOT>& _transform) :
00061         select(_select), transform(_transform)
00062         {}
00063
